subject: Flight Booking Confirmation: Delta
body: Hi Adwait, your Delta Airlines flight from LAX to JFK is confirmed for June 21st at 2:15 PM. Please arrive 2 hours early for check-in.

subject: Lunch with Jacob
body: Hey! Want to catch up over Lunch this Friday around 12:30 PM?

subject: Q2 Planning Sync
body: Let’s do a quick sync meeting on Monday about Q2 OKRs and roadmap. We can do a 20-min Zoom at 10 AM PST.

subject: Dinner Meetup
body: Hey Adwait! Are you free Saturday evening? Let's meet for dinner at that Italian place downtown.

subject: Hotel Reservation - Sheraton
body: Your stay at Sheraton San Diego is confirmed for June 22–24. Check-in starts at 3 PM. Reservation ID: SH123456.

subject: AI Conference 2024 - Invite
body: We’re excited to have you join us at the AI Conference 2024! Your Day 1 sessions begin at 9 AM on June 25 at the Moscone Center, SF.
